title: Bug 109718 - Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description: When a large content is placed in a text item, the tips that appear should show the content in a given format. However, the actual behavior is that the tips show the content in one line.
OB: The tips that appear when hovering over the text item with large content show the content in one line.
EB: The tips that appear when hovering over the text item with large content should show the content in a given format.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a text item in the layout.
2. Input the following text content in the text item: "Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7"
